name: FuncStackJs
description: Starts different tasks (functions), optionally asyncronous, and monitors the total progress
author: Nabil Redmann <repo+js@bananaacid.de> (http://nabil-redmann.de)

scripts.doc: rimraf out && jsdoc -c jsdoc.config.json --tutorials tests -R README.md FuncStack.js
scripts.devdoc: rimraf out && jsdoc --access all -c jsdoc.config.json --tutorials tests -R README.md FuncStack.js
